text:
I don't think you can pick specific items out of a split filter with HubL, I mean, in an inline manner as you tried.
You can do it separately though, like this:
`{% set url = content.widgets.top_video.body.value %}`
   `{% set video_id_test = url|split('=') %} {{ video_id_test[1] }}`

Hi, HubSpot automatically generates pages for tags created. Is there a way to assign custom page titles and meta descriptions to these tag generated pages? This HubSpot website seems to have achieved it, but completely stumped as to how: <https://www.starmind.ai/resources/tag/reduce-support-ticket-volumes>
